syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Chemistry 9701

learning_objectives.description: define the term isotope in terms of numbers of protons and neutrons
understand the notation A_y X for isotopes, where x is the mass or nucleon number and y is the atomic or proton number
state that and explain why isotopes of the same element have the same chemical properties
state that and explain why isotopes of the same element have different physical properties, limited to mass and density
